AI Description: Clang is a compiler front end for the C, C++, and Objective-C programming languages. It uses LLVM as its back end, providing highly optimized code generation. Clang is designed to provide fast compiles, expressive diagnostics, and a modular architecture for easy integration with other tools and libraries.
Core Features: Support For C, C++, & Objective-C Languages, Highly Optimized Code Generation Using Llvm Back End, Fast Compilation Times, Expressive Diagnostics For Easy Debugging, Modular Architecture For Easy Integration With Other Tools & Libraries
